column2: Gdad, 75 or over Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Fungus was on toes and on sides and bottom of feet. Did recommended application for 2 weeks. Used all of two 12g tubes of Lotrimin Ultra. Expensive but worth it as symptoms disappeared; and got bonus of reduced toenail fungus. No side effects.
